title: @Reav3 I think Morgana's update should be VMGU instead of a VU only
body:
Now that there's another subgroup besides VU, GU and VGU as seen in the [riot support page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202294884-Champion-Update-Schedule) for Ezreal's update. I think we should expect more  "Visual and Minor Gameplay Update (VMGU)" and "Minor Visual and Gameplay Update (MVGU)" in the future.

But why does morgana receives a VU only? The roadmap stated that her passive and w would be receiving tweaks/change so that means she has a minor GU too. I also think changing the VFX of the abilities is also considered as a GU as well. I hope this can be change or be clarified to us players :D

tl;dr : The riot support page should indicate that morgana should receive a Visual and Minor Gameplay Update instead of Visual update only.

replies.body: The reason she is currently only a VU is that August just started working on her. We are not currently committing to gameplay changes for Morgana unless he finds something that is a clear upgrade to either her passive or W. Until that happens she will remain a VU, but if we do find changes we likes for either of those abilities she will be upgraded to a VMGU.

Thanks for the feedback reav3! I was just confuse because you guys stated in the past that you wouldn't do VUs anymore nevertheless Morg was a special case like what you've stated. And I also thought that August did Morg and Kayle at the same time, so may bad. But those that mean kayle is in the polishing state already and you guys just waiting for Morg to be finished? lastly, her passive is very underwhelming considering that there's some item that has the same mechanic as her passive. I hope that could be replaced. Nevertheless, I trust August, You and the whole K&M team in reworking them :D Goodluck Guys.

OFFTOPIC: What does Xenogenic's next project is? a new champ? or another VGU? and why does Nunu's reveal page takes so long lol?

Kayle is far from the polishing stage, we only just entered early production on her which leaves August room to start working on some Morgana kit stuff. K&M are still pretty far off.

Xenogenic is working on another VGU right now with BravoRay and FauxSchizzle.

Reveal page should be up soon

OMG Nunu is really the best VGU up to date, specially all of his kit remained as seen in his reveal page. Its so sick! It might even surpass WW as the best rework to date. I can sense it. The only thing that I need to know now is the numbers to make the judgments conclude.

Oh I thought Kayle was already done considering that she was worked on early as last year (maybe her pre-production was long).

Lastly, so, is this pattern correct? ez-reinboom -> colorful mage-solcrushed -> chained champ-squad5 -> K&M-August -> VGU-RiotJag -> New Champ-CT -> VGU-Xenogenic ?

Here you are talking about new champions and Developers working on new champion. Unless you hired more workers, I see almost 4 to 5 new champions coming out next year on top of the two coming out this year. Stop.

Not sure I get this, currently we have Ezreal, Kayle, Morgana, and 3 other VGUs in early discovery phases, which is quote a bit of VGUs. That being said, we will likely go back to a more even split of New/VGUs next year.

While VGUs are great, the amount of skins and skin splash art we did this year is not really sustainable and pretty much pushed the team to the maximum (not in a good way). A lot of the Champions we currently have to do VGUs on have A LOT of skins, where as in the past many of them only had like 3-4 skins. 

VGU's also have a cost, where not matter how awesome the VGU and how well it is received there will be people that quite the game because they lost something they love, even if it's better after the VGU. We think this cost is worth it to keep our game holistically feeling fresh and modern, so we don't plan on stopping VGUs anytime soon, but it is a cost for sure. This year in particular we have seen a increasing sentiment of player frustrated at the amount of change that has occurred to the game this year.

Reav3, is it possible to ever go back and add a champ themed strongly after someone that got a VGU?  I mean give it a new kit and model and all that, but something that tries to bring X back into the game if it can be done healthily enough.

For example Evelynn lost her hybrid scaling because one rioter said that would have forced her into being more of a bruiser/skirmisher when you guys wanted an assassin.  So could a female hybrid champ designed for jungle/top/mid be brought back into the game at some point?
Yeah totally possible

Such a Good Question!!

Out of curiosity how did you guys end up doing ezreal anyway? Since obviously he's a champion who has pretty good gameplay that didn't need huge changes, he stands out among all vgus as a surprising choice

At the time we were really short on designers on Champions Team, and Ezreal was something we wanted to test for awhile. It made sense then that given our limited design resources that we try the project out , since the design scope was so small we could essentially start building the model/anims and what not at the same time we explored a new W. We had artists that were ready to work on something but we didn't have any kits locked and ready for production, thus we started Ezreal

That makes sense, I'd be interested in seeing that kind of treatment for a few other champs too if the ezreal one has a big impact on player satisfaction or whatever :)
